item.title: Getting Started with Shika Theme
item.description: Getting Started with Shika Theme Welcome to the Shika theme documentation! This guide will help you understand the basic structure, features, and how to use the Shika theme effectively for your Hugo website. Theme Overview Shika is a modern, clean, and responsive Hugo theme designed for blogs, personal websites, and documentation sites. It features: Responsive design that works on all devices Beautiful card-based layouts for posts and tutorials Multilingual support (English and Arabic) Dark mode with bright accent colors Customizable sections and layouts Basic Structure The theme follows a standard Hugo structure with some customizations:
